Circumstances by reason of which change has occurred Disposal of ordinary shares by the registered holder who is a custodian appointed by one or more funds managed by one or more subsidiaries of abrdn plc (formerly known as Standard Life Aberdeen plc). abrdn plc is deemed interested by virtue of its shareholding in its subsidiaries pursuant to Section 8(4)(c) of the Companies Act 2016
